name: Pogo Pete Breaks the Commodore 16
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color.  Created with GB-Studio! Original version: Various Artists - 1985-1987 - like: Mastertonic, Players,  Tynesoft and so on! :) 

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Original Story: Grab 12 original Commodore 16 games and crush them into ONE.

Controls on original machine:
Start the game: Start key
Move: Cursor LEFT and RIGHT
Jump higher: A

Controls on browser:
Start the game: Enter
Move: Arrow LEFT and RIGHT
Jump higher: Z
